location.zh-cn: 美国马里兰州巴尔的摩

description.zh-cn: 位于美国马里兰州巴尔的摩的私立研究型大学，被认为是美国第一所研究型大学。其冠状病毒资源中心在2019冠状病毒病疫情期间追踪全球病例，成为权威数据来源之一。
description.en: A private research university in Baltimore, Maryland, considered the first research university in the United States. Its Coronavirus Resource Center tracked global cases during the COVID-19 pandemic, becoming one of the authoritative sources of data.

description.zh-cn: 美国富商、慈善家和贵格会教徒，其遗产被用于创建约翰斯·霍普金斯大学和约翰斯·霍普金斯医院。
description.en: An American entrepreneur, philanthropist, and Quaker whose bequests founded the Johns Hopkins University and the Johns Hopkins Hospital.

location.zh-cn: 美国马里兰州巴尔的摩

description.zh-cn: 由约翰斯·霍普金斯的遗产捐赠建立的教学医院，与约翰斯·霍普金斯大学紧密相连。
description.en: A teaching hospital founded through a bequest from Johns Hopkins, closely affiliated with Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 德国的一所古老大学，其研究所概念被约翰斯·霍普金斯大学所采用。
description.en: An ancient university in Germany whose research institute concept was adopted by Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 德国的著名大学，其大学模式是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学建立时仿效的对象。
description.en: A famous German university whose model was emulated by Johns Hopkins University at its founding.

description.zh-cn: 由北美顶尖研究型大学组成的协会，约翰斯·霍普金斯大学是其创始成员之一。
description.en: An organization of leading research universities in North America, of which Johns Hopkins University is a founding member.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一所私立研究型大学，其办学理念和模式受到了约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的巨大影响。
description.en: A private research university in the United States whose philosophy and model were greatly influenced by Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的独立机构，为科学和工程学的研究提供资助。约翰斯·霍普金斯大学连续多年从其获得高额科研经费。
description.en: An independent agency of the U.S. federal government that supports research in science and engineering. Johns Hopkins University has received substantial research funding from it for many consecutive years.

nodes.id: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院

zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学下属的医学院，是美国第一所开展研究生教育的医学院，对后来的医学教育机构产生了深远影响。
description.en: The medical school of Johns Hopkins University, it was the first medical school in the U.S. to offer graduate education and has profoundly influenced subsequent medical education institutions.

nodes.id: 布隆伯格公共卫生学院

zh-cn: 布隆伯格公共卫生学院

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学下属的公共卫生学院，创办于1916年，是全美第一所公共卫生学院。2001年为表彰主要资助者麦克·彭博而改名。
description.en: The school of public health at Johns Hopkins University, founded in 1916 as the first school of public health in the U.S. It was renamed in 2001 to honor its major benefactor, Michael Bloomberg.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京的医学院，1917年以约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院为蓝本建立。
description.en: A medical college in Beijing, China, established in 1917, modeled after the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院和公共卫生学院的首任院长，并出任协和医学院的创始院长。
description.en: The first dean of the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine and School of Public Health, and the founding dean of Peking Union Medical College.

description.zh-cn: 彭博有限合伙企业创始人，前纽约市市长，约翰斯·霍普金斯大学校友及重要捐赠人。
description.en: Founder of Bloomberg L.P., former Mayor of New York City, and an alumnus and major benefactor of Johns Hopkins University.

nodes.id: 严重特殊传染性肺炎疫情

zh-cn: 严重特殊传染性肺炎疫情

description.zh-cn: 一场由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）导致的全球大流行病。约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的冠状病毒资源中心对此疫情进行了持续追踪和数据发布。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). The Coronavirus Resource Center at Johns Hopkins University continuously tracked and published data on this pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的首任校长。
description.en: The first president of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 美国第28任总统，约翰斯·霍普金斯大学校友，唯一拥有哲学博士头衔的美国总统，1919年诺贝尔和平奖得主。
description.en: The 28th President of the United States, an alumnus of Johns Hopkins University, the only U.S. president to hold a Ph.D., and the 1919 Nobel Peace Prize laureate.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第14任副总统，国际知名“砷中毒”权威学者，约翰斯·霍普金斯大学校友。
description.en: The 14th Vice President of the Republic of China, an internationally renowned authority on arsenic poisoning, and an alumnus of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，曾任嘉义市市长、行政院卫生署署长、监察院院长等职，约翰斯·霍普金斯大学校友。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who has served as Mayor of Chiayi City, Director-General of the Department of Health, and President of the Control Yuan. She is an alumna of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 曾任香港大学副校长，2022年起任国立清华大学校长，约翰斯·霍普金斯大学校友。
description.en: Former Vice-President of the University of Hong Kong, appointed President of National Tsing Hua University in 2022. He is an alumnus of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 美国马里兰州的公立大学，与约翰斯·霍普金斯大学在曲棍球项目上是传统对手。
description.en: A public university in Maryland, USA, and a traditional rival of Johns Hopkins University in lacrosse.

nodes.id: 保罗·尼采高级国际研究学院

zh-cn: 保罗·尼采高级国际研究学院
en: Paul H. Nitze School of Advanced International Studies

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学下属的研究生院，专注于国际关系研究，于1950年并入大学。
description.en: A graduate school of Johns Hopkins University focusing on international relations, which merged with the university in 1950.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的音乐学院，于1977年并入大学。
description.en: The music conservatory of Johns Hopkins University, which merged with the university in 1977.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学依据其创建人约翰斯·霍普金斯的遗嘱，使用其700万美元遗产的一半建立。
description.en: Johns Hopkins University was established with half of the $7 million estate bequeathed by its founder, Johns Hopkins.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯医院依据其创建人约翰斯·霍普金斯的遗嘱，使用其700万美元遗产的一半建立。
description.en: The Johns Hopkins Hospital was established with half of the $7 million estate bequeathed by its founder, Johns Hopkins.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学采用了德国海德堡大学的研究所概念，成为美国第一所研究型大学。
description.en: Johns Hopkins University adopted the research institute concept from Germany's Heidelberg University, becoming the first research university in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学在创建时仿照了以柏林洪堡大学为代表的德国大学模式。
description.en: At its founding, Johns Hopkins University was modeled after the German university system, as represented by Humboldt University of Berlin.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的理念和模式对后来的美国大学产生了巨大的影响，芝加哥大学是其中的典型例子。
description.en: The philosophy and model of Johns Hopkins University had a great influence on later American universities, with the University of Chicago being a typical example.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学是美洲大学协会的14所创始校之一。
description.en: Johns Hopkins University is one of the 14 founding members of the Association of American Universities.

relationships.source: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院

description.zh-cn: 1917年，北京协和医学院以约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院为蓝本建立。
description.en: In 1917, Peking Union Medical College was established, modeled on the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine.

relationships.target: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院

description.zh-cn: 威廉·亨利·韦尔奇是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学医学院的首任院长。
description.en: William H. Welch was the first dean of the Johns Hopkins School of Medicine.

relationships.target: 布隆伯格公共卫生学院

description.zh-cn: 威廉·亨利·韦尔奇是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学公共卫生学院的首任院长。
description.en: William H. Welch was the first dean of the Johns Hopkins School of Public Health.

description.zh-cn: 威廉·亨利·韦尔奇出任协和医学院的创始院长。
description.en: William H. Welch served as the founding dean of Peking Union Medical College.

relationships.target: 布隆伯格公共卫生学院

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学公共卫生学院于2001年更名为布隆伯格公共卫生学院，以表彰其主要资助者麦克·彭博。
description.en: The Johns Hopkins School of Public Health was renamed the Bloomberg School of Public Health in 2001 to honor its major benefactor, Michael Bloomberg.

description.zh-cn: 麦克·彭博被列为约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的知名校友。
description.en: Michael Bloomberg is listed as a notable alumnus of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: Daniel Gilman是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的首任校长。
description.en: Daniel Gilman was the first president of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 美国第28任总统汤玛斯·伍德罗·威尔逊是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的校友。
description.en: The 28th U.S. President, Thomas Woodrow Wilson, was an alumnus of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第14任副总统陈建仁是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的校友。
description.en: Chen Chien-jen, the 14th Vice President of the Republic of China, is an alumnus of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物张博雅是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的校友。
description.en: Taiwanese politician Chang Po-ya is an alumna of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 国立清华大学校长高为元是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的校友。
description.en: Kao Wei-yuan, President of National Tsing Hua University, is an alumnus of Johns Hopkins University.

description.zh-cn: 约翰斯·霍普金斯大学与马里兰大学在曲棍球项目上是传统的老对手。
description.en: Johns Hopkins University and the University of Maryland are traditional rivals in lacrosse.

relationships.source: 保罗·尼采高级国际研究学院

description.zh-cn: 高级国际研究学院（SAIS）于1950年并入约翰斯·霍普金斯大学，成为其下属学院。
description.en: The School of Advanced International Studies (SAIS) merged with Johns Hopkins University in 1950, becoming one of its constituent schools.

description.zh-cn: 皮博迪学院于1977年并入约翰斯·霍普金斯大学，成为其音乐学院。
description.en: The Peabody Institute merged with Johns Hopkins University in 1977, becoming its music conservatory.

description.zh-cn: 国家科学基金会是约翰斯·霍普金斯大学的重要科研经费来源之一，该校连续31年被列为全美科研经费开支最高的大学。
description.en: The National Science Foundation is a significant source of research funding for Johns Hopkins University, which has been ranked number one in the U.S. for research and development spending for 31 consecutive years.
